ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Wraithbone doesn t hammer doesn t proc. I bought it from another player. it is a Kunark drop. Loading allakhazam info to find out how to get wraithbone.. At
ygData.messageBody:
Wraithbone doesn't hammer doesn't proc. I bought it from another player. it
is a Kunark drop. Loading allakhazam info to find out how to get
wraithbone.. At the time I bought it it cost around 750pp. Took me a loooong
time to get the coin for it. had to trade my enamaled black mace toward it
bc I was short on coin. But that was a loong time ago. I recently got a
better weapon, Centi Warhammer for 150pp off a player.
http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/item.html?item=3737
says lvl to attain is 38.
Hope this helps.
luv,
-Su

> May I ask the levels required for the wraithbone
> hammer and the velium hammer and are those items one
> purchases from vendors or other players?
>
> Amaiya, the Evercurious
> Druid, Fennin Ro, Loyal to Tunare
>
>
> --- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> >
> > Good question.. I dunno. My druid uses a wraithbone
> > hammer.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
> > > What level do you need to be at for these?
> > > I am a Druid with a Velium Hammer and it tells me
> > I
> > > have not enough wisdom for this weapon.
> > >
> > > Any ideas?
> > >
> > > Rob
> > > --- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> > > >
> > > > You can use items with charges. or that proc
> > spells
> > > > or something. Like
> > > > velium weapons which proc velium shards.
> > > > luv,
> > > > -Su
> > > >
> > > > > how can i get magic if im not a wizard or
> > anything
> > > > that can use magic
> > > >
